title: 和朋友约时间
situation: You're making plans with a friend to meet up this weekend.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 週末有空吗？一起吃饭吧。
turns.pinyin: Zhōumò yǒu kòng ma? Yīqǐ chīfàn ba.
turns.translation: Are you free this weekend? Let's get food together.

turns.speaker: user
turns.pinyin: Kěyǐ, shí'èr diǎn zài nǎ jiàn?
turns.translation: Sure, where should we meet at noon?
